list.name: Default
list.comment:
Configuration Mixin is not in action, upto 400 households to be modelled, configurarable amount of RES prosumers in the grid. Data class is fixed, reasonable robust and accepting csv load profiles, 1-step functionality is depreciated currently, would like to revive it though. microgrid is iterating over steps now, steps decided in grid config now, which is better.
Agents are not trading, will be next step.
